nodes.text: Berka was a Nautolan resident of Black Spire Outpost on Batuu. During the war between the First Order and the Resistance, Berka privately denounced the First Order's presence on the planet. Bakkar, owner of the Ronto Roasters restaurant, advised Berka to keep quiet about the First Order, who monitored Batuu's communication frequencies, but Berka, who saw the First Order as no threat, saw no need to, insisting that the conflict would eventually settle.
